channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Toward better
item.description: In our work to make things better, it’s easy to overlook two things: The best way to make things better is to begin. Create the conditions for others ...

item.title: Conspiracy Theories And Misinfo Spread As Ireland Goes To The Polls
item.description: Conspiracy theories and far-right rhetoric are being shared across Ireland in advance of Friday's general election.

item.title: Is there a market(place)?

item.title: The long walk

item.title: SC24 Shows AI Drive Prompts Higher Capacity SSDs
item.description: QLC 60-122+ TB SSDs have been announced by several companies for AI applications. I expect that they may have some impact on HDD secondary storage.

item.title: Three Reasons AI Agents Require The Leap Of Faith

item.title: AI Invades The Arts, But Is Only In Its First Act
item.description: Ayad Akhtar, Pulitzer-winning author, producer, and playwright, has been experimenting with AI for his own works, including a Broadway play about AI.

item.title: How Businesses Can Protect Their Customers’ Identities
